1   /**
2    * This package contains mock implementations of the
3    * {@link org.springframework.core.env.Environment Environment} and
4    * {@link org.springframework.core.env.PropertySource PropertySource}
5    * abstractions introduced in Spring 3.1.
6    *
7    * <p>These <em>mocks</em> are useful for developing <em>out-of-container</em>
8    * unit tests for code that depends on environment-specific properties.
9    */
10  package org.springframework.mock.env;
